project_abstract.cdata: The Honduras Judicial Branch Modernization Project supports implementation of the Judicial Branch Modernization Plan 2004-2009.   The project will be achieved through the following four inter-related components: A. Improvement of the Efficiency of Judicial Services to strengthen operational capabilities of the Judicial Branch to more efficiently process cases, issue judgments, and review appeals. B. Enhancing Judicial Accountability and Transparency to enhance Judicial Branch accountability and transparency standards. C. Promoting Equitable Access to Justice to address shortages and disparities in justice services, especially for the disadvantaged. D. Project Coordination, Monitoring and Evaluation to strengthen institutional capability, mobilization for change, oversight of the modernization program process, and donor coordination.
